attributes.action: Her Majesty the Queen should now dissolve Parliament.
attributes.background: The Prime Minister is acting ultra vires (beyond her authority) in seeking an extension to Article 50. Parliament voted against an extension. The British people are fed up with the PM’s lack of leadership and Parliament’s disapproval of ‘no deal’. We don’t want a deal until after we’ve left the EU.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not clear what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Under the Fixed Terms Parliament Act 2011 the Queen cannot dissolve Parliament.
You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237487
